AAU.caption: color changed
AAU.doc: alled as the original input changes. Only happens when the input is closed or the 'Choose' button is clicked.
AAU.name: color_changed

AAD.caption: Initial color
AAD.doc: The initial color of the color picker. Can be any color string.
AAD.name: initial_color

AAE.caption: Show input
AAE.doc: Check this if you want your users to be able to type in a color string. e.g #17d9fd
AAE.name: show_input

AAF.caption: Show transparency slider
AAF.doc: Check to allow for alpha transparency selection
AAF.name: show_alpha

AAG.caption: Disabled
AAG.doc: If checked the color picker will be disabled
AAG.name: disabled

AAH.caption: Show palette
AAH.doc: If checked a color palette will be displayed to make convenient for users to choose from frequently or recently used colors. When the colorpicker is closed, the current color will be added to the palette if it isn't there already.
AAH.name: show_palette

AAJ.caption: Show palette only
AAJ.doc: Check this box if you want only the palette to show.
AAJ.name: palette_only

AAK.caption: Toggle palette only
AAK.doc: Color picker can show a button to toggle the colorpicker next to the palette. This way, the user can choose from a limited number of colors in the palette, but still be able to pick a color that's not in the palette.
AAK.name: toggle_palette_only

AAL.caption: Show selection palette
AAL.doc: Color picker can keep track of what has been selected by the user with when this is checked.
AAL.name: show_selection_palette

AAM.caption: Max selection size
AAM.doc: This is how many elements are allowed in the selectionPallete at once.
AAM.name: max_selection_size

AAN.caption: Hide after palette select
AAN.doc: You can have the colorpicker automatically hide after a palette color is selected.
AAN.name: hide_after_select

AAO.caption: Clickout will accept color
AAO.doc: When clicking outside of the colorpicker, you can force it to fire a change event rather than having it revert the change.
AAO.name: clickout_fires_change

AAP.caption: Show previous color
AAP.doc: Colorpicker can show the color that was initially set when opening. This provides an easy way to click back to what was set when opened.
AAP.name: show_previous_color

AAQ.caption: Show buttons
AAQ.doc: You can show or hide the buttons using the showButtons property. If there are no buttons, the behavior will be to fire the `change` event (and update the original input) when the picker is closed.
AAQ.name: show_buttons

AAV.caption: Format
AAV.doc: You can set the format that is displayed in the text box. This will also change the format that is displayed in the titles from the palette swatches.
AAV.name: preferred_format

AAT.caption: value
AAT.doc: Current selected color as a color string.
AAT.name: value
